data.name: BaseFrameProperties
desc: specifies the properties that are provided by all text frames, graphic objects, embedded objects and frame styles.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

types.name: FrameInteropGrabBag
desc: Grab bag of frame properties, used as a string-any map for interim interop purposes.
This property is intentionally not handled by the ODF filter. Any member that should be handled there should be first moved out from this grab bag to a separate property.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: AllowOverlap
desc: This defines if the frame is allowed to overlap with other anchored objects.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.4

properties.name: AnchorFrame
desc: contains the text frame the current frame is anchored to.
The value is valid only if the AnchorType is TextContentAnchorType.AT_FRAME.

properties.name: AnchorPageNo
desc: contains the number of the page where the objects are anchored.
The value is valid only if the AnchorType is TextContentAnchorType.AT_PAGE.

properties.name: BackColor
desc: contains the color of the background of the object.

properties.name: BackGraphic
desc: contains the graphic for the background.
**since**
LibreOffice 6.1

properties.name: BackGraphicFilter
desc: contains the name of the file filter for the background graphic.

properties.name: BackGraphicLocation
desc: determines the position of the background graphic.

properties.name: BackGraphicURL
desc: contains the URL for the background graphic.

Note the new behaviour since it this was deprecated: This property can only be set and only external URLs are supported (no more vnd.sun.star.GraphicObject scheme). When an URL is set, then it will load the graphic and set the BackGraphic property.

properties.name: BackTransparent
desc: If TRUE, the \"BackColor\" is ignored.

properties.name: BorderDistance
desc: contains the distance from the border to the object.

properties.name: BottomBorder
desc: contains the bottom border of the object.

properties.name: BottomBorderDistance
desc: contains the distance from the bottom border to the object.

properties.name: BottomMargin
desc: contains the bottom margin of the object.

properties.name: ContentProtected
desc: determines if the content is protected.

properties.name: Description
desc: contains description for the object
The long description text can be entered to describe an object in more detail to users with screen reader software. The description is visible as an alternative tag for accessibility tools.
**since**
OOo 3.2

properties.name: FillGradient
desc: If the property FillStyle is set to FillStyle.GRADIENT, this describes the gradient used.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.1

properties.name: FillGradientName
desc: If the property FillStyle is set to FillStyle.GRADIENT, this is the name of the gradient used.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.1

properties.name: FillStyle
desc: This enumeration selects the style the area will be filled with.
Currently only set for gradients.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.1

properties.name: Height
desc: contains the height of the object (1/100 mm).
It is only valid if TextEmbeddedObject.RelativeHeight is zero.

properties.name: HoriOrient
desc: determines the horizontal orientation of the object.

properties.name: HoriOrientPosition
desc: contains the horizontal position of the object (1/100 mm).
It is only valid if \"HoriOrient\" is HoriOrientation_NONE.

properties.name: HoriOrientRelation
desc: determines the environment of the object to which the orientation is related.

properties.name: HyperLinkName
desc: contains the name of the hyperlink that is set at the object.

properties.name: HyperLinkTarget
desc: contains the name of the target for a hyperlink that is set at the object.

properties.name: HyperLinkURL
desc: contains the URL of a hyperlink that is set at the object.

properties.name: IsSyncHeightToWidth
desc: determines whether the height follows the width.

properties.name: IsSyncWidthToHeight
desc: determines whether the width follows the height.

properties.name: LayoutSize
desc: returns the actual size of the object.

Since to obtain the correct actual size of the object not only the layouting for the frame needs to be finished but the whole document needs to be formatted as well. Thus if that was not done previously it may take some while to retrieve this value.
**since**

properties.name: LeftBorder
desc: contains the left border of the object.

properties.name: LeftBorderDistance
desc: contains the distance from the left border to the object.

properties.name: LeftMargin
desc: contains the left margin of the object.

properties.name: Opaque
desc: determines if the object is opaque or transparent for text.

properties.name: PageToggle
desc: determines if the object is mirrored on even pages.

properties.name: PositionProtected
desc: determines if the position is protected.

properties.name: Print
desc: determines if the object is included in printing.

properties.name: RelativeHeight
desc: contains the relative height of the object.
It is only valid if it is greater than zero.

properties.name: RelativeHeightRelation
desc: contains the relation of the relative height of the object.
It is only valid if RelativeHeight is greater than zero.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.3

properties.name: RelativeWidth
desc: contains the relative width of the object.
It is only valid if it is greater than zero.

properties.name: RelativeWidthRelation
desc: contains the relation of the relative width of the object.
It is only valid if RelativeWidth is greater than zero.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.3

properties.name: RightBorder
desc: contains the right border of the object.

properties.name: RightBorderDistance
desc: contains the distance from the right border to the object.

properties.name: RightMargin
desc: contains the right margin of the object.

properties.name: ServerMap
desc: determines if the object gets an image map from a server.

properties.name: ShadowFormat
desc: contains the type of the shadow of the object.

properties.name: ShadowTransparence
desc: This defines the degree of transparence of the shadow in percent.
This is the same as setting the Color member of the ShadowFormat property to an ARGB color.
**since**
LibreOffice 4.2

properties.name: Size
desc: contains the size of the object.

properties.name: SizeProtected
desc: determines if the size is protected.

properties.name: Surround
desc: determines the type of the surrounding text.

properties.name: SurroundAnchorOnly
desc: determines if the text of the paragraph in which the object is anchored, wraps around the object.

properties.name: Title
desc: contains short title for the object
This short title is visible as an alternative tag in HTML format. Accessibility tools can read this text.
**since**
OOo 3.2

properties.name: TopBorder
desc: contains the top border of the object.

properties.name: TopBorderDistance
desc: contains the distance from the top border to the object.

properties.name: TopMargin
desc: contains the top margin of the object.

properties.name: VertOrient
desc: determines the vertical orientation of the object.

properties.name: VertOrientPosition
desc: contains the vertical position of the object (1/100 mm).
It is only valid if TextEmbeddedObject.VertOrient is VertOrientation.NONE.

properties.name: VertOrientRelation
desc: determines the environment of the object to which the orientation is related.

properties.name: Width
desc: contains the width of the object (1/100 mm).
It is only valid if TextEmbeddedObject.RelativeWidth is zero.

properties.name: WrapInfluenceOnPosition
desc: determines the influence of the text wrap on the positioning of the shape
The value of this property is only evaluated for the positioning of the shape, if the text document setting ConsiderTextWrapOnObjPos is TRUE. Valid values are given by WrapInfluenceOnPosition
**since**
OOo 2.0
